content:
92101 is a great location! You're surrounded by some excellent bike shops in San Diego. Here are a few recommendations for you:

1. **The Bike Revolution**: Located in the heart of downtown San Diego, The Bike Revolution offers top-notch bike maintenance and repair services. They're known for their expert mechanics and quick turnaround times. (Address: 611 3rd Ave, San Diego, CA 92101)
2. **RIDE Cyclery**: With over 20 years of experience, RIDE Cyclery is a local favorite for bike repairs, custom builds, and bike fitting. They're passionate about getting people on two wheels and offer a wide range of services. (Address: 1301 2nd Ave, San Diego, CA 92101)
3. **Pacific Beach Bike Shop**: This family-owned shop has been serving the San Diego community for over 40 years. They offer a full range of services, from routine maintenance to custom builds, and are known for their friendly, knowledgeable staff. (Address: 1741 Garnet Ave, San Diego, CA 92109 - just a short ride from 92101)
4. **North Park Bike Shop**: This shop is dedicated to providing top-quality service and repair work. They're passionate about cycling and offer a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere. (Address: 3030 University Ave, San Diego, CA 92104 - a short ride from 92101)

Before taking your bike in for maintenance, I recommend calling ahead to confirm their hours, pricing, and availability. It's also a good idea to ask about their experience with triathlon bikes and components, as well as their turnaround time for repairs.

Remember to always inspect your bike before taking it in for maintenance, and be prepared to provide as much information as possible about your bike and the issues you're experiencing. This will help the mechanics provide a more accurate estimate and ensure your bike is back on the road in no time!
